name: Sniper Animal Hunter 2016
description:
Sniper Animal Hunter 2016 is the best animal hunting game available in app store. If you are looking for Best Sniper Game to Hunt animals just go for Sniper Animal Hunting 2016. Sniper Animal Hunting 2016 is loaded with variety of animals i.e. Deer, Bear, boar, Zebra and many more. Sniper Animal Hunting 2016 gives you a new challenge of hunting animals in each level. Sniper Animal Hunting sets different tasks of hunting in each level. Just take your sniper rifle and start your quest of hunting. You will face challenge of limited time in each level to finish your task of animal hunting. Just get your sniper, set your scope and aim animals in the jungle to get real feel of animal hunting. Aim animals with perfection and don’t let them to escape. Sniper Animal Hunter 2016 is loaded with four different Sniper Rifles based on their fire ranges and scope range. Sniper Animal Hunter 2016 has variety of hunting targets for you. Just follow the instructions given at beginning of each level. To make Sniper Animal hunter more interesting you will face targets i.e. Lung shot, Heart shot, Head shot and Body shot. Hunt more and more to unlock levels and to upgrade your sniper rifle. Hunting wild beasts is fun when you are expert hunter. Be an expert hunter with Sniper Animal Hunter 2016. Enjoy the adventure of real life hunting. Enjoy the hunting in ambient environment of Sniper Animal Hunter 2016. Enjoy your hunting in both day and night environment as per your device time. Sniper Animal Hunter 2016 will automatically adjusts the environment according to your current time i.e. day or night.
Enjoy Hunting.
Game Features:

1.Best 3D Environment
2.Real Life Hunting experience
3.Extreme and ultimate Hunting action
4.30 levels of real Sniper Animal Hunting
5.4 different Sniper Rifles
6.Real Sniper rifle physics
7.Best Multi-touch Game Controls

How to Play:

Sniper Animal Hunter 2016 is loaded with 30 different level of hunting. Take your Sniper Rifle and follow the instructions given at the start of every level. You will face the time parameter to achieve your mission. Set your scope, aim animal as per instructions given to you and hit fire to hunt.

Note: For more details please refer to “How to Play screen”.
